What are the treatments for Fukuyama congenital muscular dystrophy ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Fukuyama congenital muscular dystrophy:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Congenital Muscular Dystrophy Overview  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Fukuyama Congenital Muscular Dystrophy  - Genetic Testing Registry: Fukuyama congenital muscular dystrophy
